_xResult.title: Oh My Sleek Green Evening Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made green evening dress with ruffle sleeve
_xResult.longdesc:
Just enough for a tease of your passions, this custom made evening dress will leave your presence burning in the room long after you've gone. The fabric is a cotton-silk blend and clings in all the right places. The emerald green draws the eye in deeply and the ruffle adds a light and airy touch. This bespoke evening dress is one your closet has been missing for far too long. 

 

Want to make it all your own? You can make the following cutomizations: 

 

Neckline: u-neck, v-neck, jewel

 

Dress length: above knees, knee length, below knees 

 

If you've never experienced having a dress made custom to your measurements, you'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
